name: Sex Adventures - Love Yacht
description:
About the game
An erotic visual novel about a rich young man and two girls eager to have fun.
The story becomes more interesting after they get to know each other better.
Visual Novel Description
Victor is a rebellious young man who allows himself to indulge in all his desires.
Tired of traveling alone on the family yacht, he decided to invite some girls to accompany him.
Irina is the first he thinks of. They met in a club in Takrinthos a few months ago and have spent several nights together since then.
Wanting to surprise the young millionaire, Irina does not come alone and calls a friend with her to enjoy the comforts of life together.
Features
- 60+ HD renders
- Animations
